headline: Elon Musk Reveals Where He Spends His Saturdays (Hint: It's Not Politics)
summary: Tesla Inc‘s (NASDAQ:TSLA) CEO Elon Musk just offered a rare glimpse into how he actually allocates his most valuable currency: time. And no, it's not campaign rallies, social media, or culture-war sparring. His Saturdays, he said, are booked solid with silicon. "If I'm spending my Saturdays on something, it's going to be something pretty important," Musk told investors on Tesla's fourth quarter earnings call.
